Is my money safe with MariBank?Yes  your money is safe with us!MariBank is regulated by Monetary Authority of Singapore (MAS) under the Digital Full Bank License and is also a Deposit Insurance (DI) Scheme member.This means that your deposits are insured (both principal and interest) up to S$100 000 in aggregate per depositor by Singapore Deposit Insurance Corporation (SDIC) in Singapore. Foreign currency deposits  dual currency investments  structured deposits and other investment products are not insured.
